body: I smiled, more at the plan than the question. "For sure."
Her eyes lit up. "Oh! What did you think?"

content.name: "Yeah, great. A lot better than what I wrote."
"Incredible. I’m going to read it to my children every night before they go to sleep."
"You’re getting a tea, right? I’d love to talk about it, but I think we should talk about it when we’re all settled."
